https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6rbQ92LFXLvBEM0wI0iCLjNlZNW.jpg A man with a clipboard asks passersby a survey question: "Are you the favorite person of anybody?" He has a scale, from "very certain" on down. His manner is open. He offers oranges to one respondent. He talks, one at a time, to three people. Their answers, however brief, are revealing. Are You the Favorite Person of Anybody?
